user.title: WhoLLM Setup
user.description: Configure your LLM provider for person-level presence detection.

model.title: Model Selection
model.description: Select the LLM model to use.

rooms.title: Room Configuration
rooms.description: Select the rooms in your home to track. You can also add custom room names.

persons.title: People & Pets

room_entities.title: Room Entity Mapping
room_entities.description:
Assign sensors and devices to each room. This helps WhoLLM understand which entities indicate activity in which room.

Select motion sensors, media players, lights, computers, and other devices for each room.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the LLM provider. Check the URL and try again.
error.at_least_one_entity: Please configure at least one person or pet to track.
error.at_least_one_room: Please select at least one room to track.

room_entities.title: Room Entity Mapping
room_entities.description: Assign sensors and devices to each room.

person_devices.title: Person Device Ownership
person_devices.description: Assign devices owned by each person (their phone, PC, etc). If that device is active, it strongly suggests that person is nearby.

confidence_weights.title: Confidence Weights
confidence_weights.description: Adjust how much each signal type contributes to presence detection. Higher percentage = more influence on the final prediction.
